languages.text: "Не стоит утруждаться подобным насилием над собой, о шерин". {n}Джай бодро улыбается, но покрасневшие глаза ее выглядят почти что мертвыми.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Не стоит утруждаться подобным насилием над собой, о шерин". {n}Джай бодро улыбается, но покрасневшие глаза ее выглядят почти что мертвыми.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "You don't have to subject yourself to this horror, shereen." {n}Jae offers a cheery smile, but her reddened eyes look almost dead.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не стоит утруждаться подобным насилием над собой, о шерин". {n}Джай бодро улыбается, но покрасневшие глаза ее выглядят почти что мертвыми.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You don't have to subject yourself to this horror, shereen." {n}Jae offers a cheery smile, but her reddened eyes look almost dead.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「こんな恐怖に身をさらす必要はないよ、シャリーン」{n}ジェイは陽気な笑みを浮かべるものの、赤くなった目は、ほとんど死んでいるようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You don't have to subject yourself to this horror, shereen." {n}Jae offers a cheery smile, but her reddened eyes look almost dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「こんな恐怖に身をさらす必要はないよ、シャリーン」{n}ジェイは陽気な笑みを浮かべるものの、赤くなった目は、ほとんど死んでいるようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “你没必要非遭这种罪不可，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊露出了欢快的笑容，但她双眼通红，眼神如同死了一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You don't have to subject yourself to this horror, shereen." {n}Jae offers a cheery smile, but her reddened eyes look almost dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你没必要非遭这种罪不可，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊露出了欢快的笑容，但她双眼通红，眼神如同死了一般。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «No tiene por qué sufrir este horror, shereen». {n}Jae ofrece una sonrisa alegre, pero sus ojos enrojecidos parecen casi inertes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You don't have to subject yourself to this horror, shereen." {n}Jae offers a cheery smile, but her reddened eyes look almost dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No tiene por qué sufrir este horror, shereen». {n}Jae ofrece una sonrisa alegre, pero sus ojos enrojecidos parecen casi inertes.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas à endurer ces horreurs, shereen. » {n}Jae vous lance un sourire enjoué, mais ses yeux rougis sont totalement vides.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You don't have to subject yourself to this horror, shereen." {n}Jae offers a cheery smile, but her reddened eyes look almost dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas à endurer ces horreurs, shereen. » {n}Jae vous lance un sourire enjoué, mais ses yeux rougis sont totalement vides.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr müsst Euch diesem Schrecken nicht aussetzen, Shereen." {n}Jae lächelt aufmunternd, aber ihre geröteten Augen wirken fast tot.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You don't have to subject yourself to this horror, shereen." {n}Jae offers a cheery smile, but her reddened eyes look almost dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst Euch diesem Schrecken nicht aussetzen, Shereen." {n}Jae lächelt aufmunternd, aber ihre geröteten Augen wirken fast tot.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Kendine eziyet etmene lüzum yok şirinim." {n}Jae, neşeli bir tavırla gülümsüyor. Bu sırada kan çanağı gözleri ise âdeta ölü gibi bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You don't have to subject yourself to this horror, shereen." {n}Jae offers a cheery smile, but her reddened eyes look almost dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kendine eziyet etmene lüzum yok şirinim." {n}Jae, neşeli bir tavırla gülümsüyor ama kan çanağı gözleri neredeyse ölü gibi bakıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
